attributes.action: To spread the cost across the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I live in London and have to pay extra on my council tax to pay for this farce. Why is it not spread across the country after all every one benefits from it by way of prestige. Why cannot the many pay for the few?  We petition the Prime Minister to spead the cost of the olympics to every person across the country
